Lady Luck Smiles.name: Lady Luck Smiles
Lady Luck Smiles.flavor: Youâ€™re a good luck charm to your allies, attracting the blessing of Lady Luck in everything you do.
Lady Luck Smiles.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, whenever an ally within 5 squares of you makes a melee or a ranged attack roll, he or she can roll twice and use either result.

Strike of Foul Fate.name: Strike of Foul Fate
Strike of Foul Fate.flavor: You strike your foe and infuse it with ill fortune to keep it from harming your comrades.
Strike of Foul Fate.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target is marked. While the target is marked by you, whenever it attacks one of your allies, it must make two attack rolls and use the lower result.

Favored Fortune.name: Favored Fortune
Favored Fortune.flavor: You believe in luck, but you also believe in seizing opportunities when they come.
Favored Fortune.trigger: You or an ally within 5 squares of you makes a damage roll
Favored Fortune.target: The triggering character in the burst
Favored Fortune.effect: The target rerolls the damage roll and can use either result.
